channel.title: Shakespeare Country
channel.description: Shakespeare Country showcases the rich cultural heritage at the heart of England around Stratford Upon Avon in Warwickshire where England's most celebrated playwright was born. A Podcats production for www.shakespeare-country.co.uk.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Shakespeare Country showcases the rich cultural heritage at the heart of England around Stratford Upon Avon in Warwickshire where England's most celebrated playwright was born.
channel.itunes:summary: Shakespeare Country showcases the rich cultural heritage at the heart of England around Stratford Upon Avon in Warwickshire where England's most celebrated playwright was born. A Podcats production for www.shakespeare-country.co.uk.
channel.itunes:author: Jane Markham

item.title: Shakespeare Country
item.description: Jane Markham visits the Royal Shakespeare Company following their hugely successful Complete Works Festival and looks ahead to 2007 and the transformation of Stratford Upon Avon's Theatres
item.author: jane@podcats.co.uk
item.itunes:subtitle: Jane Markham visits the Royal Shakespeare Company following their hugely successful Complete Works Festival
item.itunes:summary: Jane Markham visits the Royal Shakespeare Company following their hugely successful Complete Works Festival and looks ahead to the rest of 2007 and the transformation of Stratford Upon Avon's theatres.
item.itunes:author: Jane Markham
